title: ZKP REST microservice: Longfellow and BBS
description:
## Features

This is a demo to create and verify longfellow/bbs proofs. The REST APIs are powered by [Zenroom](https://zenroom.org), the same code runs on mobile, and in the browser. The microservices can be extended in Zencode, see the playground [Apiroom](https://apiroom.net). The microservices and the underlying components are **open source**. This instance offers:

- Longfellow-zk: circuit generation, proof generation, verification

- BBS: credential issuance, proof generation, verification

## REST APIs

### Longfellow-zk

Click on *üîê longfellow-zk* and then click on *generate-proof* to create a proof and *verify-proof* to verify it.

### BBS

Click on *ü™™ bbs* and then on *sign-credential* to issue a credential, then *generate-proof* to generate a proof and finally on *verify-proof' to verify it.

## Tech stack, repos and playground

- Cryptography and business logic executed by [Zenroom](https://zenroom.org) and [Slangroom](https://dyne.org/slangroom/) and implemented in [Zencode](https://dev.zenroom.org/#/pages/zencode-intro?id=smart-contracts-in-human-language)
